entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
